name: I ant you !
description:
Description :

A game made for Brackeys game jam 2021.

You are an ant and need to go to the rosebush to take the delicious aphids that are on it.
But there are obstacles and holes, so you will need the help of the whole colony to get there.

Good luck and thanks for playing !

Controls :
Move modeHorizontal arrow keys
MoveVertical arrow keys
RotateSpaceJumpShiftGo to the rotate mode

Rotate mode
Vertical arrow keysRotateShiftFix the ant and spawn a new ant
Credits :

Music :
Music (from icons8.com) by Hard Fact

Tilesets : 
By craftpix.net
